item.description:
Hi all,

We tried to do karaoke after the NY's dinner party - but the venue was all booked up that nite. We will give it another try - come and enjoy dinner and then Karoke after. Whether you are a good singer or not it doesn't matter. We will sing for the enjoyment & fun.

This RSVP is for both dinner and karoke. We've made reservations at both the restaurant and Golden Leaf (karaoke venue). We have a VIP room reserved that can hold up to 16-20 people. They do charge by the hour for Karoke, so we will all chip in for the cost.

 

We hope you can make it. As always - please update your RSVP if your plans change.

Parking is tough in chinatown. If you do find a space - remember the parking meters go until 8 pm.
item.how_to_find_us: We will have tables reserved for our meetup group.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner & Karaoke
